title: Dr. Strangelove (1964) (Peter Sellers, George C. Scott)
description:
DR. STRANGELOVE, OR HOW I LEARNED TO STOP WORRING AND LOVE THE BOMB - 1964

IMDb Rating: 8.7
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0057012/

  Arguably the greatest black comedy ever made, Stanley Kubrick's cold-war classic is the ultimate satire of the nuclear age. Beginning when General Jack D. Ripper (Sterling Hayden), a maniacal warrior obsessed with "the purity of precious bodily fluids," mounts his singular campaign against Communism by ordering a squadron of B-52 bombers to attack the Soviet Union. The Soviets counter the threat with a so-called "Doomsday Device," and the world hangs in the balance while the U.S. president (Peter Sellers) engages in hilarious hot-line negotiations with his Soviet counterpart. Sellers also plays a British military attache and the mad bomb-maker Dr. Strangelove; George C. Scott is outrageously frantic as General Buck Turgidson, whose presidential advice consists mainly of panic and statistics about "acceptable losses."

  Starring: Peter Sellers, George C. Scott, Sterling Hayden, Keenan Wynn, Slim Pickens.

  Directed by: Stanley Kubrick.

  Quality: Very Good Xvid from DVD.

  Length: 1hr. 34min.

  Language: English.

  Size: 640 x 480
